comment: Horrible professor! Does not teach at all. Gives you group assignments every week with 3 major grades that are difficult and make no sense. When it comes to asking questions, he doesnt answer them at all and he is a harsh grader. Doesnt answer your emails, and the most pointless class. Get another professor if you can!!

ENGL1101. Hands-off online class. Chill guy, lax grader. Three major assignments, 60%, weekly participation assignments, 40%. No final. The weekly assignments were done in groups of three or four- hopefully, y'all like your assigned groups. Generally a fun class though.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: I had him during the fall 2020 semester and due to COVID our class became fully online. At first There were no problems up until everything class related was on facebook, he didnt use D2L at all which was annoying and on top of that, all of our work was group work for the whole semester which is hard when your team wasn't doing their part.

He is one of those professors that wants you to learn rather than give out grades. One major paper and two group assignments and then weekly assignments. Nice guy don't stress it just participate in class. He also looks like John Cena.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects

comment: U create a cartoon portfolio of cartoons of your own, like the New Yorker magazine & write a cover letter for this project. Nxt proj. is writing 5 minute sets (stand up comedy) and then the final part you combine several & make it into one. The final project is a video of a sketch about student life, that U do in a group of 3. Easy grade.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: I love him so much that I had to register for his 1102 class. His classes are different from your average English classes, and that makes his teaching style unique. You have two textbooks that revolve around rhetoric, humor, comedy, and more. There are four major assignments and no final or exams. He grades fair and wants us to succeed.

Professor Alarcon is a great professor, he gives great lectures and really wants you to do well, attendance is mandatory and there are 3 projects and no final. Definite A if you show up to class and do the homework on time. explains things really well, would definitely take again.
Everyday there is a group assignment and his writings assignments are crazy hard. Do not take him!! There are 4 papers and they are over some hard rhetoric bull sh*t.

Great teacher , I would 100% take again. Attendance is Mandatory and there are only 3 main assignment that you are graded besides class participation. His classwork not only helps with projects but forces you to interact with the class. Overall great teacher, just stay on top of deadlines and participate in the class and it'll be a breeze.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy

comment: i love him so much!!!! he made class really fun and its easy to keep a high grade if you just do your work and dont forget deadlines!! He is actually such a good teacher and her really interacts with everyone. Overall a great teacher and i would def take him again!!!!
